title: What does it mean by (f°g)(x)?
text: it means \"evaluate g at x, then evaluate f at the result g(x)\" which is f(g(x)).

title: Substitute $$2x+5$$ for f(x)
text: Substitute $$2x+5$$ for x in f(x) and get $$f{\left(2x+5\right)}$$

title: Calculate f(x) with new x
text: Calculate f(x) $$=$$ $$4x+3$$ with x replaced by $$2x+5$$, which is $$f(x)=4\left(2x+5\right)$$ + 3
